Research

Overview

My research focuses on developing human-centered AI systems that enhance reasoning, analysis, and decision-making capabilities for high-stakes and knowledge-intensive domains including finance, law, and national security. I work at the intersection of large language models, agent-based systems, and complex decision-making environments.

🚀 Collaborative Knowledge Curation (CKC) Initiative

A DARPA-funded research project focused on Generative AI, Large Language Models, and Knowledge Graphs.

This initiative aims to: - Advance generative AI and large language models - Integrate knowledge graphs for more robust reasoning - Enhance human-AI collaboration in high-stakes domains

Research Areas

My work spans multiple interconnected areas of AI and machine learning:

🤖 Agent Inference & Evaluation

Developing autonomous agents capable of complex reasoning and decision-making:

  • Long-horizon Planning: Creating agents that can plan and execute multi-step strategies
  • Strategic Gaming: Using economic and strategic games as evaluation environments
  • Tool Integration: Enabling agents to effectively use external APIs, calculators, and domain-specific tools
  • Decision-Making Frameworks: Building robust decision architectures for uncertain environments

📊 Model Evaluation & Fine-Tuning

Creating benchmarks and evaluation methodologies for domain-specific AI:

  • FLaME Framework: Financial Language Model Evaluation benchmark
  • NLP Task Design: Question answering, summarization, and reasoning benchmarks
  • Knowledge Representation: Developing ontologies and structured knowledge systems
  • Verification Systems: Ensuring safety and truthfulness in model outputs

🏗️ Knowledge Systems

Building and integrating knowledge systems for enhanced AI capabilities:

  • Knowledge Graphs: Integration with structured knowledge bases
  • RAG Pipelines: Retrieval-augmented generation for accurate, grounded responses
  • Fairness & Interpretability: Building transparent and auditable AI systems
  • Scalable Architecture: Designing systems for enterprise deployment

Current Projects

DARPA Knowledge Curation

Funded by DARPA Advanced Research Concepts

Developing collaborative AI systems for knowledge discovery and curation in complex domains.

Financial AI Benchmarking

Collaboration with FinTech Industry Partners

Creating comprehensive evaluation frameworks for AI systems in financial applications.

Multi-Agent Economic Simulations

Georgia Tech Financial Services Innovation Lab

Using game-theoretic environments to study and improve AI decision-making.

Collaborations

I actively collaborate with: - Georgia Tech Financial Services Innovation Lab - Entertainment Intelligence Lab - Industry Partners: Leading financial institutions and technology companies - Government Agencies: DARPA and other research organizations

Join Our Research

I’m always looking for motivated students and collaborators interested in: - Large language models and agent systems - Financial AI applications - Human-AI interaction - Game theory and strategic reasoning

Please contact me if you’re interested in working together.
